text.div:
BC LateralityVS ValueSet

Anatomical location or specimen further detailing the side(s) of interest. Codes are from NCI

name: LateralityVS
title: BC LateralityVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Anatomical location or specimen further detailing the side(s) of interest. Codes are from NCI

concept.display: BILATERAL Affecting both sides of the body, or a pair of organs.
CONTRALATERAL Having to do with the opposite side of the body, in relation to a pre-existing reference point.
IPSILATERAL Having to do with the same side of the body, in relation to a pre-existing reference point.
LATERAL Situated at or extending to the side.
LEFT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
RIGHT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
UNILATERAL Affecting one side of the body or one of a pair of organs.
